product_name: Stanley Classic Vacuum Food Jar - 17 fl. oz.
long_description: Pack a hot lunch in the Stanley Classic Vacuum food jar the next time you hit the road or head out on a day hike. Double-wall vacuum insulation keeps food and liquid hot for hours. Rugged stainless-steel design stands up to regular use in the mountains or at the work site; features no liners or coatings and is 100% BPA free. Wide-mouth opening makes the container easy to fill and clean; dimensions are 3.8 x 7.25 inches. Insulated lid doubles as a 12 fl. oz. bowl. Leakproof stopper keeps the contents from spilling.
short_description: Pack a hot lunch in the Stanley Classic Vacuum food jar the next time you hit the road or head out on a day hike.
